hymn.title: Trust Him when thy wants are many

layout.singingstanza: Trust Him when thy wants are man -- y; Trust Him when thy friends are few; And the time of swift temp -- ta -- tion Is the time to trust Him too.

lyrics.stanza: Trust Him when thy soul is burdened With the sense of all its sin; He will speak the word of pardon, He will make thee clean within.
Trust Him for the grace sufficient, Ever equal to thy need; Trust Him always for the answer, When in His dear name you plead.
Trust Him when dark doubts assail thee, Trust Him when thy strength is small, Trust Him when to simply trust Him Seems the hardest thing of all.
Trust Him, then, through cloud or sunshine, All thy cares upon Him cast, Till the storm of life is over, And the trusting days are past.
